title: Fake Free Wi-Fi Scam Targets Australian Airports, Flights: Report
content: A 42-year-old man from Western Australia faces charges for allegedly setting up fake Wi-Fi networks at airports and on domestic flights across Perth, Melbourne, and Adelaide.
summary: A 42-year-old man from Western Australia faces charges for allegedly setting up fake Wi-Fi networks at airports and on domestic flights across Perth, Melbourne, and Adelaide.

title: US Supreme Court Ruling Curbs Federal Agencies Powers
content: The conservative-majority US Supreme Court on Friday overturned 40 years of legal precedent to weaken the power of federal agencies, which regulate myriad issues affecting the everyday lives of Americans, from air pollution to food and drugs.
summary: The conservative-majority US Supreme Court on Friday overturned 40 years of legal precedent to weaken the power of federal agencies, which regulate myriad issues affecting the everyday lives of Americans, from air pollution to food and drugs.

title: US To Expand Deportation Relief, Work Permits To 309,000 More Haitians
content: The Biden administration will expand deportation relief and work permits to an estimated 309,000 Haitians in the country already, the U.S. Department of Homeland Security said on Friday.
summary: The Biden administration will expand deportation relief and work permits to an estimated 309,000 Haitians in the country already, the U.S. Department of Homeland Security said on Friday.

title: India Becomes Part Of Global Bond Index Effective Today
content: India government bonds or government securities are set for inclusion in the global bond index from today.
summary: India government bonds or government securities are set for inclusion in the global bond index from today.

title: 60 Indian Nationals Arrested In Sri Lanka For Cyber Crime Operations
content: At least 60 Indian nationals part of a group engaged in online financial scams have been arrested by Sri Lanka's Criminal Investigations Department.
summary: At least 60 Indian nationals part of a group engaged in online financial scams have been arrested by Sri Lanka's Criminal Investigations Department.

title: India, US Extend Digital Tax On E-Commerce Supplies Till June 30
content: India and the US have decided to extend a 2 per cent equalisation levy or digital tax on e-commerce supplies until June 30, the finance ministry said on Friday.
summary: India and the US have decided to extend a 2 per cent equalisation levy or digital tax on e-commerce supplies until June 30, the finance ministry said on Friday.

title: Azerbaijan To Hold Snap Parliamentary Election On September 1
content: President Ilham Aliyev of Azerbaijan scheduled snap parliamentary elections for Sept. 1 in a decree published on Friday in a widely expected move that appears unlikely to radically change the parliament's make-up.
summary: President Ilham Aliyev of Azerbaijan scheduled snap parliamentary elections for Sept. 1 in a decree published on Friday in a widely expected move that appears unlikely to radically change the parliament's make-up.

title: 22-Year-Old Killed In North Korea For Watching K-Pop: Report
content: North Korea enforces strict control over information and entertainment, imposing severe punishments for violations.
summary: North Korea enforces strict control over information and entertainment, imposing severe punishments for violations.

title: S Jaishankar To Lead Indian Delegation At SCO Summit Next Week
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar will lead the Indian delegation at the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation (SCO) summit next week, the Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) announced on Friday.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar will lead the Indian delegation at the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation (SCO) summit next week, the Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) announced on Friday.

title: Biden's Shaky Debate Has Overseas Allies Bracing For Trump Return: Report
content: While the first US presidential debate of the 2024 race dwelled little on foreign policy, a shaky performance by President Joe Biden will have America's allies steeling for the return of Donald Trump, analysts say.
summary: While the first US presidential debate of the 2024 race dwelled little on foreign policy, a shaky performance by President Joe Biden will have America's allies steeling for the return of Donald Trump, analysts say.

title: Einstein's Warning Letter To US Franklin Roosevelt Set To Fetch $4 Million
content: A historic letter written by Albert Einstein to President Franklin D Roosevelt in 1939, urging the US to develop a nuclear program, is set to be auctioned for at least $4 million.
summary: A historic letter written by Albert Einstein to President Franklin D Roosevelt in 1939, urging the US to develop a nuclear program, is set to be auctioned for at least $4 million.

title: Trump Media Shares Climb After Biden's Shaky Debate Showing Against Trump
content: Shares of Trump Media & Technology Group rose as much as nearly 13% in premarket trading on Friday after President Joe Biden's faltering performance against Republican rival Donald Trump at the first 2024 U.S. presidential debate.
summary: Shares of Trump Media & Technology Group rose as much as nearly 13% in premarket trading on Friday after President Joe Biden's faltering performance against Republican rival Donald Trump at the first 2024 U.S. presidential debate.

title: Princess Anne Released From Hospital After Horse Accident Treatment
content: Princess Anne, the sister of Britain's King Charles III, has been discharged from hospital where she was treated for concussion after being struck by a horse at her country estate.
summary: Princess Anne, the sister of Britain's King Charles III, has been discharged from hospital where she was treated for concussion after being struck by a horse at her country estate.

title: Who Is Keir Starmer, Rishi Sunak's Labour Party Opponent And PM Frontrunner
content: In May 2024, British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak made a surprise snap election announcement. Now, the UK will vote on July 4 and the focus, apart from the Prime Minister's Conservative Party, is on Keir Starmer, the Labour Party's candidate.
summary: In May 2024, British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak made a surprise snap election announcement. Now, the UK will vote on July 4 and the focus, apart from the Prime Minister's Conservative Party, is on Keir Starmer, the Labour Party's candidate.

title: "Democrat Served Up An Old Man As...": Vivek Ramaswamy Jabs Joe Biden
content: Indian-American entrepreneur Vivek Ramaswamy who dropped out of the 2024 Republican presidential race after finishing fourth in the Iowa caucuses earlier, has now taken a jibe at US President Joe Biden for his re-run.
summary: Indian-American entrepreneur Vivek Ramaswamy who dropped out of the 2024 Republican presidential race after finishing fourth in the Iowa caucuses earlier, has now taken a jibe at US President Joe Biden for his re-run.

title: Indian Student Fakes Father's Death For US Scholarship. Gets Arrested
content: An Indian student was arrested and deported after it came to light that he falsified documents to obtain a full scholarship.
summary: An Indian student was arrested and deported after it came to light that he falsified documents to obtain a full scholarship.

title: Polls Open In Iran For Presidential Elections Post Ebrahim Raisi's Death
content: Polls in Iran opened on Friday for a presidential election following the death of ultraconservative president Ebrahim Raisi in a helicopter crash last month.
summary: Polls in Iran opened on Friday for a presidential election following the death of ultraconservative president Ebrahim Raisi in a helicopter crash last month.

title: 7.2 Magnitude Earthquake Hits Central Peru Coast, Tsunami Alert Lifted
content: A magnitude 7.2 earthquake struck off the coast of central Peru on Friday, the United States Geological Survey said, but a tsunami threat from the tremor has passed.
summary: A magnitude 7.2 earthquake struck off the coast of central Peru on Friday, the United States Geological Survey said, but a tsunami threat from the tremor has passed.

title: OceanGate Co-Founder To Dive Into "Portal To Hell" Year After Titan Tragedy
content: Dean's Blue Hole is a 664-foot underwater cavern surrounded by a beach on a remote Bahaman island. It formed some 15,000 years ago.
summary: Dean's Blue Hole is a 664-foot underwater cavern surrounded by a beach on a remote Bahaman island. It formed some 15,000 years ago.

title: South Korea Releases Video Debunking North Korea's Missile Success Claim
content: South Korea's military on Friday released a video that it said showed a North Korean missile abnormally spiralling early in flight and exploding, a rare publicising of surveillance footage to dismiss the North's claim of a successful test.
summary: South Korea's military on Friday released a video that it said showed a North Korean missile abnormally spiralling early in flight and exploding, a rare publicising of surveillance footage to dismiss the North's claim of a successful test.
